description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in File Manager by Bit Form Team File Manager – 100% Free & Open Source File Manager Plugin for WordPress | Bit File Manager.This issue affects File Manager – 100% Free & Open Source File Manager Plugin for WordPress | Bit File Manager: from n/a through 5.2.7.

product.name: File Manager – 100% Free & Open Source File Manager Plugin for WordPress | Bit File Manager

vendor.name: File Manager by Bit Form Team
